document_data.caption: An Amphail fancy adorned in high quality horse tack made by the [[Eagleshield]]s
document_data.name: Amphail Fancy
document_data.mainbody: The '''Amphail fancy''' were a regal breed of riding [[horse]]s, exclusively bred by the renowned horse breeders of the village of [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]], in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were popular among nobility across the [[Sword Coast North]].
document_data.Description: These horses had light brown coats, with a white stripe down their face and black manes that were typically braided.
